vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10;
son of: Simeon (H8095);
brother of: Jemuel (H3223), Jamin (H3226), Ohad (H0161), Zerah (H2226L) and Shaul (H7586H); also called Jarib at 1Ch.4.24;
§ Jachin = "He will establish"
n pr m
1) the 4th son of Simeon and founder of the family of Jachinites
2) a priest and the head of the 21st coursein the time of David
3) a post-exilic priest in the time of Nehemiah
n pr
4) name of the right-hand pillar before the temple
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) יָרִיב   hijo de Simeón; (b)   sacerdote; post exílico; (c)   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   pilar en el templo de Salomón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅斤 这个專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他將建立"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 西緬第四個兒子，雅斤族的創立者
2) 一個祭司，大衛王時期第二十一班次的領袖
3) 尼希米時期被擄後一個祭司
專有名詞
4) 聖殿前右邊柱子的名字
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅斤 这个专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他将建立"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 西缅第四个儿子，雅斤族的创立者
2) 一个祭司，大卫王时期第二十一班次的领袖
3) 尼希米时期被掳后一个祭司
专有名词
4) 圣殿前右边柱子的名字

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Jachin = "He will establish"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) the 4th son of Simeon and founder of the family of Jachinites
2) a priest and the head of the 21st coursein the time of David
3) a post-exilic priest in the time of Nehemiah
n pr
4) name of the right-hand pillar before the temple

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.10
§ Jachin = "He will establish"
n pr m

2) a priest and the head of the 21st coursein the time of David
3) a post-exilic priest in the time of Nehemiah
n pr
4) name of the right-hand pillar before the temple
